ygData.subject: Re: Taunting Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: I did the same thing, I totally missed the taunt skill when I went to train.  I finally put one point in it when I was on level 8, and BANG my skill just
ygData.messageBody:
I did the same thing, I totally missed the taunt skill when I went to
train. I finally put one point in it when I was on level 8, and BANG
my skill just started rising as soon as I started taunting again.
Yes you do need one seed point in taunt.


>Hi
>I was wondering when the taunting skill goes up because since I first
>started, I taunted everytime I fought a creature. Now I'm on lvl 6
>but the skill is still less than feeble. Do I have to put practice
>points on it first or doesn't it raise until a certain lvl?
>
>Elthain of Felwithe
>Paladin of Tunare
>Mithaniel Marr server
>
